thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com | 4 of 120
thread.title: LeTara

author: LeTara
title: LeTara
text: I like fab kids, they have wonderful choices from shoes to cloths. the only thing I do not like is the sizes I ordered and large for my 8 year old and fab kids large is more like a small to medium. my 6 year old who is really small was able to fit their large so ill try next time their x-large. and their shoes were perfect but I ordered and size bigger just incase that would happen again. either than that its perfect. the quality is great! hasn't faded yet :)
